title: Joint Declaration of the Pacific Alliance and OECD

Political Actors: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development

kpi_list.kpi_text: Increase trade among member countries by 20% by 2025.
Mobilize $50 million in investment for sustainable development projects by 2024.
kpi_list.target_description: Mobilize investment for sustainable development projects

kpi_list.kpi_text: Establish a regional cooperation framework for environmental protection by 2023.
kpi_list.target_description: Establish a framework for regional cooperation on environmental issues

kpi_list.kpi_text: Enhance capacity building initiatives for 500 public officials by 2026.
kpi_list.target_description: Train public officials in various sectors

kpi_list.kpi_text: Implement a joint strategy for digital transformation by 2025.
kpi_list.target_description: Implement a joint strategy for enhancing digital capabilities

kpi_list.kpi_text: Reduce carbon emissions from transportation by 30% by 2030.
Strengthen public-private partnerships in health sector by 2024.
kpi_list.target_description: Strengthen collaboration between public and private sectors in health

kpi_list.kpi_text: Achieve a 15% increase in renewable energy usage by 2025.
kpi_list.target_description: Increase the share of renewable energy in the energy mix

kpi_list.kpi_text: Develop a regional strategy for disaster risk reduction by 2023.
kpi_list.target_description: Develop a comprehensive strategy for disaster risk management

top_actors.name: Pacific Alliance
top_actors.justification: The Pacific Alliance is a key political actor in the context of the joint declaration, indicating its significant role in multilateral agreements and initiatives.

top_actors.name: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development
top_actors.justification: The OECD is crucial for economic cooperation and policy guidance, making it an important actor in the context of the joint declaration.

top_themes.name: Multilateralism
top_themes.justification: Multilateralism is the central theme of the document, as it focuses on cooperation between multiple nations, which is essential for the objectives outlined in the Joint Declaration.
